title: E-Commerce Mobile App
description: Full-featured e-commerce application with real-time inventory, payment processing, and personalized recommendations.
summary: Full-featured e-commerce application with real-time inventory, payment processing, and personalized recommendations.

challenges.solution: Integrated Stripe and local payment gateways with secure tokenization and 3D Secure authentication.
Implemented Algolia for instant search with typo tolerance, filters, and faceted navigation.
Built a cart synchronization system that persists across devices and sessions using Firebase.
Designed targeted push notification campaigns for order updates, promotions, and abandoned carts.

outcome: The e-commerce app has successfully launched with strong user adoption, featuring seamless shopping experience and reliable payment processing that has driven consistent monthly revenue growth.
